subject_terms_3: Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Photography
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There are 3 sets of railroads running side by side vertically. A train occupies the middle track. The background and sides of the photograph comprises of trees. The railroad on the rightr connects with the middle railroad at several points.
sgcool_label_text: "This image is part of the ""Tracking Memories"" collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Locomotives Railroads Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Railroad trains
